src.description: The URL of the logo image. This is required.

alt.description: The alternative text for the logo image. This is required for accessibility.

width.description: The width of the logo image in pixels.

height.description: The height of the logo image in pixels.

href.description: The URL to navigate to when the logo is clicked. If provided, the logo will be rendered as an anchor tag.

monochrome.description: If true, the logo will be displayed in monochrome. This is useful for dark mode or specific design requirements.

whiteInverted.description: If true, the logo will be displayed in white inverted style. This is useful for dark backgrounds.
